com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store

Class DeferredDeleter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store.DeferredDeleter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStoppable

    public class DeferredDeleter
extends Object
implements StartAndStoppable
    Helper class used for handling deletions asynchronously.
